name: God save the CHRIST!
description:
DESCRIPTION

Jesus is walking through the streets of Jerusalem, where danger is coming from everywhere! From bandits to hateful citizens, nowhere is safe. So you, God, have to protect him using your Godly powers! 

Ha! See what I did there?

This game is just as awesome and funny as my humor!

It was made for Ludum Dare 46, with the theme being Keep it Alive

I would advise you to unzoom the page to see all of the game

DISCLAIMER

We are not hating on religion, everything depicted in this game is purely for comedic purposes

CREDITS

Gogani : Game design and code

Caberu : Game design, code and art

Hivernote : Music and sound design
